Writer: Marc Klein (screenplay), Jason Keller (screenplay), Melisa Wallack (screen story)
Title: Mirror Mirror
Actors: Julia Roberts, Lily Collins, Armie Hammer, Nathan Lane
Plot: An evil queen steals control of a kingdom and an exiled princess enlists the help of seven resourceful rebels to win back her birthright.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 8 nominations.
